amendment.description: An amendment numbered 495 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to reduce the sunset provision for Section 5112(c) of the Department of State Authorization Act of 2021 (Division E of Public Law 11781) from 2 years to 1 year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A043) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 170 - 257 (Roll no. 348).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A043) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Connolly.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A043) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 170 - 257 (Roll no. 348).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
